title: Unlike its fancy Polishing Cloth, Appleâ€™s new 3-meter Thunderbolt 4 Pro cable is fairly priced
content:
Apple is notorious for selling relatively overpriced products. One could argue that for their excellent qualities and long lifespans they’re actually fairly priced. However, some products almost objectively have ridiculous price tags — such as the infamous $19 Polishing Cloth. Ultimately, the Cupertino tech giant isn’t a nonprofit organization, and making more money is its

The post Unlike its fancy Polishing Cloth, Apple’s new 3-meter Thunderbolt 4 Pro cable is fairly priced appeared first on XDA.
description: Apple has started selling a 3-meter Thunderbolt 4 Pro cable. It is currently unrivaled and costs a reasonable $159 in the US.
